entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
